title: Poster, "Werden und Vergehen, Regula Guhl, Mae Rose, Marie Nocker, Andy  Goldsworthy", ca. 1992
inscribed: Printed in black ink, lower margin: Gestaltung: René Gauch. Satz: Karl Schwegler AG. Siebdruck: Bea Spillmann
provenance: Sara and Marc Benda (acquired new and directly from designer, René Gauch); 2010: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On white ground, two gray triangles with vertical text in black and white: Werden 27.5. – 30.8.1992 / Scneeball-Weizengras-Rosenduft / MUSEUM BELLERIVE / und Vergehen / Zurich 8 Hoschgasse 3.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Werden und Vergehen, Regula Guhl, Mae Rose, Marie Nocker, Andy  Goldsworthy", ca. 1992. Offset lithograph on wove paper. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-123.
